message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you at $1,300,000. We understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, but we hope this offer will be acceptable.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $1,300,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm prepared to offer $1,250,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me.
